creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
description: very elaborate, bonnet-style headdress; dark indigo and black cotton base; crown and back have rows of applied silver metal studs; sides have rows of silver Indian rupee coins and beaded panels with predominately red beads; hoops at interior at ears with triangle silver metal pendants on chains; beaded loops and pendant chain with floral charms and drops below chin; very long beaded loops at sides and back; heavy round-linked chains with pendants on each side; long red fur drops with pink and white horsehair ends on back
dimension: 26 1/2 x 14 1/4 x 10 7/8 in. (67.31 x 36.2 x 27.62 cm) (including beaded loops)
medium: Beads, coins, metal, cotton, animal fur (?), horsehair
title: Headdress
